widget.header: Claudia Duque Attended a Womenâ€™s Empowerment Event

description: Our colleague Claudia attended the swearing-in of the Board of Directors of AFFET (Association of Executive Women of Tourism Companies of the Mexican Republic A.C. Coahuila Chapter). The Association's mission

config: is to promote women's participation in different fields to contribute to the empowerment, growth, and well-being of women in Coahuila. Learn more in this local newsletter article.
